body_html: Okay no problem. Also keep in mind that the actual code samples you had are a proof of concept but wouldn't be able to be checked into our repo -- we need to make it possible to add a device without any device-specific changes to the TensorFlow code, so that will likely take some work to do, I think.

body: Okay no problem.  Also keep in mind that the actual code samples you had are a proof of concept but wouldn't be able to be checked into our repo -- we need to make it possible to add a device without any device-specific changes to the TensorFlow code, so that will likely take some work to do, I think.
